That would be pretty cool!

item.title: Custom Sprites [Updated May 29, 2015]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:551629”]Or he could leave the old download links and just add onto the thread…

Version 1:
Everything currently.
-download link-
Version 2:
-What’s new in the package-
-Download link-

Your argument for him to make packages containing only the new sprites isn’t worth his time. He’d have to create a full package for the people that have yet to download any, and another package for people like you who only want the new sprites.

A third solution would be to just post literally every sprite using BBC and then just making a single download package for them all, and adding new images to the thread/package. Then people can pick based on everything they see, or to download literally everything.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Sprites [Updated May 29, 2015]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Or he could leave the old download links and just add onto the thread…

Version 1:
Everything currently.
-download link-
Version 2:
-What’s new in the package-
-Download link-

Your argument for him to make packages containing only the new sprites isn’t worth his time. He’d have to create a full package for the people that have yet to download any, and another package for people like you who only want the new sprites.

A third solution would be to just post literally every sprite using BBC and then just making a single download package for them all, and adding new images to the thread/package. Then people can pick based on everything they see, or to download literally everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Sprites [Updated May 29, 2015]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The “second quest tab” is the achievement tab, just an FYI.

No offence but I don’t really see a use for any of these except maybe the donor box, the owner icon, and the achievement icon.

No one would use the scrollbar because they need the rest of the sprites. It’d be kind of funky to have one part of it green and the rest blue.

I also don’t know what you edited for the mod icon, as I didn’t see any changes.

Read full topic
